page.title: 15A DAY IN KATHARINE'S LIFE
page.content: ON A SUNNY FRIDAY I WOULD GET UP AT 8 O'CLOCK, GET WASHED AND DRESSED AND THEN AT ABOUT 8.15 GO DOWN FOR BREAKFAST, WHICH IS USUALLY CEREAL AND BREAD. I WOULD THEN GATHER MY THINGS READY FOR SCHOOL, SETTING OFF AT 8.45. WHEN I ARRIVE AT SCHOOL EVERYONE, INCLUDING THE INFANTS, GOES INTO ASSEMBLY, THEN WE GO BACK TO THE CLASSROOM FOR MATHS. PLAY COMES NEXT, FROM 10.20 TILL 10.40. AFTER PLAY WE HAVE MORE MATHS OR ENGLISH. NEXT WE HAVE OUR LUNCH AND THEN PLAY. THE LUNCH BREAK LASTS FROM 11.55 TO 1.05. IN THE AFTERNOON WE HAVE HANDWRITING AND AFTER THAT WE HAVE OUR LAST PLAY, WHICH STARTS AT 2.05. WE FINISH OUR SCHOOL TIME WITH P.E.. MUM OR DAD COLLECT ME FROM SCHOOL.
